column4: When I was running windows 2000, my computer worked fine.  But, my father told me if I used xubuntu 8.10 it would run 10 times faster.  Why does it run slow?
Did you set up all drivers, what are comp specs, what tasks are running. What is running slow?
j-Un17:  Well, I have Celeron 533mhz processer with 156mb ram.
I think that is below the minial specs Ubuntu specified
